* Arkness nodded, watching Clendar and his comrads walk off towards the new 
city.
Though their salutes had been very noce, and had lightened her mood a 
little. Or at least her spark.
By now she was feeling very tired and worn out, but there was no time to 
sleep when you're looking after over 20 Maximals.
And though they could look after themselves, what sort of person would she 
be if she didn't at least look out for them?
Though those thoughts slipped her mind when she heard someone land near her, 
then tuenrd to see that it was Prowl.
A relieved smile crossed her lips at his greeting, leaning in against him at 
his hug and kiss.
It was nice to have someone you could lean on, especially when you haven't 
recovered from the wounds of war.*

" That would be a good idea."
